src.UI

Class Minimap

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.UI.Minimap

  • public class Minimap
extends java.lang.Object
    The minimap that appears on top right of the screen where the player can see where they've already been and items that were found

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Minimap(Map map)
      Initialise a new minimap to be based on a given map

      Draw the minimap onto the screen
      void setPlayerCoords(double x, double y)
      Set the current coordinate of the player in the tile segment grid

        public void setPlayerCoords(double x,
